pic_scanner.common.meta.version
===============================

.. py:module:: pic_scanner.common.meta.version

----------

.. autoapisummary::

   pic_scanner.common.meta.version.VERSION
   pic_scanner.common.meta.version.RELEASE_MAP


Functions

.. autoapisummary::

Module Contents
---------------

.. py:data:: VERSION

   The version information for the project.

.. py:data:: RELEASE_MAP

   The release map for the project.

.. py:function:: get_full_version_name() -> str

   Gets the full version name.

   :returns: The full version name.
   :rtype: str

   Since:
       v1.3.2


.. py:function:: parse_version() -> str

   Parses the version information into a string.

   :returns: The version information.
   :rtype: str

   Since:
       v1.3.2
